entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is described as a family member of Harry's, who is looking extremely tense and has gone very white.

entities.name: aunt marge
entities.description: Aunt Marge is described as a family member of Harry's, who is loudly asking questions about Harry's father.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is described as Uncle Vernon and Aunt Petunia's child, who has looked up from his pie to gape at his parents.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is described as a family member of Harry's, who is looking extremely tense.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as the child being talked about by his relatives.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Potter is mentioned as Harry's family name.

relationships.description: Aunt Marge is questioning Harry about his father.
Uncle Vernon is angry at Harry for not telling him what his father did.
